name: playwright-tests
description: Playwright JS test for the Fairlo assignment

scripts.test: npm run envSetup && npx playwright test tests/loanApplication.spec.js
scripts.testRegression: npm run envSetup && npx playwright test tests/loanApplication.spec.js --grep @regression
scripts.testSimpleTest: npm run envSetup && npx playwright test tests/simpletest.spec.js

author: Nandhakumar Rajendran
